stories.text: As a user, I want to search and discover music using content identification or fingerprinting.
As a user, I want to search and discover music based on my profile.
As a user, I want to search and discover music based on other users similar to myself.
actions: Search Music On Similar, Other Users To
Discover Music On Similar, Other Users To

stories.text: As a user, I want to search and discover music or ringback tones similar to a given music video based on content similarity.
actions: Search Similar Ringback Tone To A Given Music Video On Content Similarity

stories.text: As a user, I want to search and discover music by exploiting enriched metadata and image tags, so that I find related artists, new genre, or other relevant listening path.
As a user, I want to upload tagged videos and have tags available for all further processing steps.
actions: Have Available Tags For All Further Processing Steps

stories.text: As a user, I want to view thumbnail sequences of video segments.
actions: View Thumbnail Sequences Of Video Segments

stories.text: As a user, I want to get info about similar video items and segments.
actions: Get Info About Similar Video Items

stories.text: As a user, I want to get info about perceptually similar video items and segments.
actions: Get Info About Perceptually Similar Video Items

stories.text: As a user, I want to receive content recommendations from similar profiles.
actions: Receive Content Recommendations From Similar Profiles

stories.text: As a user, I want to receive content recommendations based on most relevant news events in my area.
actions: Receive Content Recommendations On Most Relevant News Events In Area

stories.text: As a user, I want to identify products in videos, and receive related information about them.
actions: Receive Related Information About Products In Videos

actions: Receive Related Information About Broadcaster Logos In Videos

stories.text: As a user, I want to identify brands in videos, and receive related information about them.
As a user, I want to take a picture or upload an image, so that I am recommended with videos related to that picture or image.
As a user, I want to walk around, access content using a geographical map and be informed if there are videos covering the area, monuments or any other relevant point of interest.
As a user, I want to search content items using automatic speech recognition.
As an admin, I want to see, validate and edit segmentation of videos.

actions: Extract A Topic For Each Segment

Rank Videos On A Quality Aspects

As a Zooniverse admin, I want to identify volunteer types.
